name: Jump Rider: Crazy Boat
description:
Ride the CRAZE with, Jump Rider: Crazy Boat
LOOKING FOR: A Jump Rider who can land this Crazy Boat to further and beyond!

Now get CRAZY and FUN!
- Gear Tap: Aim the CRAZY and go FULL SPEED!
- Balance your Boat: Try going further with PERFECT BALANCE!
- Upgrade your Boat: Stronger boats make better records!
- Collect your Boat: The more CRAZE you collect, the POWERFUL you'll be!
- Easy Control: Enjoy EASY fun with a SINGLE FINGER.
- Craze Around the World: Compete with Jump Riders all around the world.
- Airplane Mode: Never stop riding, wherever, whenever.
(It's only a matter of time till you find the 'secret' underneath the boat!

Jump Rider: Crazy Boat Customer Support - crazyboat@help.neowiz.com
